1   package org.infinispan.configuration.cache;
2   
3   import org.testng.annotations.Test;
4   
5   import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
6   
7   import static org.testng.Assert.assertEquals;
8   import static org.testng.Assert.assertTrue;
9   import static org.testng.Assert.assertFalse;
10  
11  /**
12   * Tests to ensure the L1 Configuration builder operates properly
13   *
14   * @author William Burns
15   * @since 7.0
16   */
17  @Test(groups = "functional", testName = "configuration.cache.L1ConfigurationBuilderTest")
18  public class L1ConfigurationBuilderTest {
19     public void testDefaultsWhenEnabledOnly() {
20        Configuration config = new ConfigurationBuilder().clustering().cacheMode(CacheMode.DIST_SYNC).l1().enable().build();
21  
22        L1Configuration l1Config = config.clustering().l1();
23  
24        assertTrue(l1Config.enabled());
25        assertEquals(l1Config.cleanupTaskFrequency(), TimeUnit.MINUTES.toMillis(1));
26        assertEquals(l1Config.invalidationThreshold(), 0);
27        assertEquals(l1Config.lifespan(), TimeUnit.MINUTES.toMillis(10));
28     }
29  }
